jd: From: Manasa S, iTech US INC manasa.s@itechus.net Reply to: manasa.s@itechus.net Job Role: .Net Developer Job Location: Tampa, Florida Duration: 12+ months contract We are looking for H1 B candidates from Third-party Vendors Looking only local to Florida Consultant Rate : $50/hr on C2C with TCS without any VMS Charges Role Description: Must Have Technical/Functional Skills • 9+ years experience, ASP .NET, Reactor Angular(preferred), SQL, Mongo DB • Leading and managing a team of .NET developers, assigning tasks and providing guidance and support. • Collaborating with stakeholders to gather and analyze requirements, and translating them into technical specifications. • Designing and architecting scalable and robust software solutions using the .NET framework. • Developing and coding software applications using C#, ASP.NET, and other .NET technologies. • Conducting code reviews and ensuring adherence to coding standards and best practices. • Troubleshooting and debugging complex software issues, and implementing effective solutions. • Collaborating with cross-functional teams, such as quality assurance, to ensure software quality and performance. • Keeping up-to-date with the latest .NET technologies, trends, and best practices, and recommending their adoption where applicable. • Mentoring and coaching junior developers, providing technical guidance and fostering their professional growth. • Assisting in project planning, estimation, and risk management activities. Competencies: Digital : ReactJS, Digital : Angular 2, PL/SQL, ASP.NET 4.5 Thanks & Regards Manasa Salla Sr Technical Recruiter iTech US, Inc manasa.s@itechus.net LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/in/manasa-salla-0836711a8
